title.narrative: Sport Fisheries in Papua New Guinea

description.narrative: Local-based coastal and inland sport fishing ventures in PNG could enhance livelihoods from smallholder fisheries. This one-year project is investigating existing sport fishing enterprises for Black Bass and similar species in Papua New Guinea in order to develop an understanding of pertinent management issues and to identify gaps and research needs. Key outcomes will be improved understanding of the nature and benefits of locally-based sport fishing ventures, evaluation of their potential in the context of PNG, and a preliminary understanding of the infrastructure, capacity building and fisheries information needed to support such ventures. (FIS/2011/071)
